categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Otal was a Human female Sith Warrior, who held the rank of Sith Lord during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Lord Otal appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP gear vendor for the Sith Warrior class on Vaiken Spacedock, though she was later removed in a reorganization of the gear system.
